pages.text: Medusa, the cursed queen of stone, waits in her ruined temple. Those who dare meet her gaze do not return unchanged.

pages.title: Petrifying Gaze
pages.text: Looking into Medusa’s eyes for more than 3 seconds will turn you into stone and kill you. Returning to the battle location will reveal a stone statue of yourself, containing your inventory.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text:
- Snake Strike: Summons venomous serpents. 
- Stone Wave: Turns mobs to stone. 
- Blink Dodge: Teleports behind you. 
- Stone Shard Explosion: AoE damage at 50% health.

pages.title: Battle Environment
pages.text: A ruined temple, filled with eerie statues—the frozen remains of past challengers.

pages.title: Rewards
pages.text: - Medusa's Soul \n- Medusa's Contract \n- Serpent's Wrath (Weapon)
